content:
/>
VIII.ii.1.A.1.e
.
Definition:  Qualifying Chronic Disability Under 38 CFR 3.317
Qualifying chronic disability
, under
38 CFR 3.317
, means a chronic disability resulting from any of the following or any combination of the following:
an undiagnosed illness, or
an MUCMI.
References
:  For more information on
determining chronicity, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, 1.C.1.b
, and
rating action to be taken based on specific disability patterns, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, 1.C.1.g
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on Presumptive Service Connection (SC) for Persian Gulf Veterans
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
